results.description: Arsenal are set to beat rivals Tottenham to the signing of teenager defender William Saliba from Saint-Etienne.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal set to sign defender Saliba
results.title: William Saliba: Arsenal close to completing £27m signing of Saint-Etienne defender

results.description: Tottenham make a late bid for Saint-Etienne defender William Saliba, who was set to join their north London rivals Arsenal.
results.shortTitle: Spurs rival Arsenal for defender Saliba
results.title: William Saliba: Spurs rival Arsenal for Saint-Etienne defender

results.description: Arsenal are close to signing William Saliba but will send the defender straight back to Saint-Etienne on loan.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal set to sign defender Saliba
results.title: William Saliba: Arsenal close to deal for Saint-Etienne defender

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores for Marseille and uploads his celebrations with team-mates to his Instagram story.
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Striker scores overhead kick for Marseille and films celebrations on his phone

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores the only goal of the game as Paris St-Germain beat Saint-Etienne to move 12 points clear at the top of Ligue 1.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe goal sends PSG 12 points clear
results.title: Saint-Etienne 0-1 Paris St-Germain: Mbappe sends leaders 12 points clear

results.description: Three more Ligue 1 games this weekend are postponed amid fears of more violent "yellow vest" protests in France over rising living costs.
results.title: France protests: Three more Ligue 1 games postponed, including Monaco v Nice

results.description: Ten-man Paris St-Germain move a step closer to the Ligue 1 title after a 92nd-minute own goal by Mathieu Debuchy secures a point at Saint-Etienne.
results.title: Saint-Etienne 1-1 Paris St-Germain

thumbnail.altText: Saint-Etienne defender Mathieu Debuchy scored a 92nd minute own goal to earn Paris St-Germain a dramatic point

results.description: Arsenal right-back Mathieu Debuchy joins Saint-Etienne on a free transfer after his contract is terminated.
results.shortTitle: Debuchy joins Saint-Etienne on a free
results.title: Mathieu Debuchy joins Saint-Etienne after Arsenal terminate contract

results.description: French striker Lois Diony signs for Championship club Bristol City on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Striker Diony joins Bristol City on loan
results.title: Lois Diony: Bristol City sign Saint-Etienne's French striker on loan

results.description: Edinson Cavani scores twice as Paris St-Germain beat Saint-Etienne to make it four wins out of four in Ligue 1.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 3-0 Saint-Etienne

results.description: Live text and social media as PSG beat Saint-Etienne in Ligue 1 to make it four wins out of four.
results.title: Ligue 1: PSG v Saint-Etienne

results.description: Swiss full-back Saidy Janko leaves Celtic to sign a four-year contract with St Etienne in France.
results.shortTitle: Janko leaves Celtic for St Etienne
results.title: Saidy Janko leaves Celtic for St Etienne

thumbnail.altText: Saidy Janko played 20 games over two seasons with Celtic

results.description: A huge night across Europe - text updates from Juventus v Lazio after Real Madrid defeat Celta Vigo, while Monaco clinch the title in France.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid close in on title, Juve win Coppa Italia, Monaco clinch title
results.title: La Liga & Coppa Italia final: FT: Celta Vigo 1-4 Real Madrid and Juventus v Lazio

results.description: Fans interrupt Saint-Etienne's behind-closed-doors match against Rennes in Ligue 1, with players removed from the pitch.
results.title: Fans interrupt Saint-Etienne's behind-closed-doors Ligue 1 game with Rennes

results.description: Uefa opens disciplinary proceedings over Saint-Etienne fans' behaviour in the defeat by Manchester United at Old Trafford
results.title: Uefa opens disciplinary proceedings over Saint-Etienne fans' behaviour

results.description: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho says he could tell his players were not focused or motivated in the dressing room.
results.shortTitle: Man Utd players weren't focused in warm-up - Mourinho
results.title: Jose Mourinho: Man Utd players weren't focused in warm-up

results.description: Zlatan Ibrahimovic scores his first Man Utd hat-trick as his side opens up a commanding Europa League last-32 lead against Saint-Etienne.
results.title: Manchester United 3-0 Saint-Etienne

results.description: Text commentary as tournament favourites Manchester United beat Saint-Etienne in the first leg of their Europa League last-32 tie.
results.shortTitle: Man Utd 3-0 Saint-Etienne - Ibrahimovic scores hat-trick
results.title: Europa League: Manchester United v Saint-Etienne

thumbnail.altText: Zlatan Ibrahimovic celebrates his hat trick

results.description: Nice move three points clear at the top of Ligue 1 as Valentin Eysseric scores the only goal of the game against Saint-Etienne.
